Overview of INCITE data obtained by Rayleigh¶

Here is a documentation of data for magnetohydorodynamics (MHD) simulations sets generated by the DOE INCITE project. Data for each simulation is under a certain directory. Parameters for each simulation is described in the file “main_input”.

INCITE data consists of three targets: Geodynamo and Jovian atomosphere. The paramteres and visualization examples for each models are listed in each sections.

Contents:

  • Jovian Atomosphere (mheimpel)
  • Geodynamo (ryadav)
